long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension let you automatically convert from mobile web site to regular website.
If you don't want to automatically convert, just go to the options menu  (Settings->extensions->Demobilize and choose 'options') and set the "Disable auto convert" to on.
